0.question: The first grade classes are going on a field trip. One class has 25 students. The other class has 21 students. How many first graders are going altogether?

1.question: Alex can walk to the park in 26 minutes. It takes Charlie 15 minutes. How much longer does it take Alex to walk to the park?

2.question: A ruler costs 34 cents. Cassidy wants to buy 2 rulers. How much will she pay?

3.question: Shelly has 21 marshmallows. Trina has 8 more marshmallows than Shelley. How many marshmallows does Trina have?

4.question: There are 28 frogs at the edge of the pond. 5 hop away. How many frogs are left?
